entry.sense: subst. , fem, et m. , Pl. ታቦታት፡ [ⲧⲁⲓⲃⲓ, ⲑⲏⲃⲓ, תֵּבָה, תֵּיבוּתָה, تابُوتٌ] arca , cista , κιβωτός 4 Reg. 12,9. navigium Noachi, in modum arcae constructum, Kuf. 5; Gen. 6,14 seq.; ንፍቀ፡ ታቦት፡ Matth. 24,38; Luc. 17,27; 1 Petr. 3,20. arca feralis : ገነዞ፡ ሴት፡ (sc. Adamum) ወአንበሮ፡ ውስተ፡ ታቦት፡ በምሥራቀ፡ ገነት፡ Clem. f. 11; Voc. Ae.: ታቦት፡ ብ፡ሳዕን፡ arca foederis Israëlitarum, in qua duae tabulae legum repositae erant: ታቦት፡ ዘመርጡል፡ Ex. 25,10 seq.; Ex. 38,1 seq.; ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ Num. 14,44; 4 Esr. 10,30; Apoc. 11,19; ታቦት፡ ቅድስት፡ 1 Esr. 1,3; ታቦተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ 1 Par. 13,3 seq.; 2 Par. 5,4; 2 Par. 5,5; 2 Par. 5,6; 2 Par. 5,7; 2 Par. 5,8; 2 Par. 5,9; 2 Par. 5,10; 1 Reg. 4,3 seq.; Jer. 3,16; Ps. 131,8. (Eam a Menilekio e templo Salomonis furto ablatam et in Abyssiniam transportatam in ecclesia Axumae cathedrali depositam esse, refertur in Kebr. Nag.) altare (ecclesiarum Abyssinicarum, in modum arcae constructum, in quo vasa communionis sacra reponuntur, vid. Isenb. lex. amh. p. 97 et Isenb. lex. amh. p. 31; Rüppell I. 333. Rüppell II. 112; Harris II. 168 seq.; Ludolf hist. aeth. III,6 n. 62; Ludolf comm. p. 375; Ludolf lex. c. 262.); Genz. f. 69; Lit. 158,2; ጸሎት፡ እምቅድመ፡ ያልብስ፡ ታቦተ፡ ወእምቅድመ፡ ያንብር፡ ላዕሌሁ፡ ንዋየ፡ ቅድሳት፡ Lit. 158,3; Did. ed. Platt p. 62 c. annot.; in quavis ecclesia ይኩን፡ ታቦት፡ ዘይፈልስ፡ (altare mobile) እመካን፡ ውስተ፡ መካን፡ F.N. p. 12; Pl. ታቦታት፡ F.N. p. 11. sacrarium (quippe in quo ታቦት፡ altare collocatum sit; vid. etiam Isenb. lex. p. 97): ታቦት፡ መንፈሳዊ፡ οἶκος πνευματικός 1 Petr. 2,5; አንትሙ፡ ታቦት፡ ለንጉሥ፡ βαςίλειον ἱεράτευμα 1 Petr. 2,9; Simeon senex Jesulum አዖዶ፡ ውስተ፡ ታቦት፡ Lud. ex Hom. Theoph.; Zacharias implevit ministerium suum በውስተ፡ ታቦት፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ Lud. e Vit. Mar.

tābot ጐለትኩ፡ አነ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ተክለ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ወስመ፡ መንግሥትየ፡ ፍቅር፡ ሰገድ፡ ጕልተ፡ ለታቦተ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ዘዓድዋ፡ ‘Moi, le roi Takla Giyorgis, dont le nom royal est Feqer Sagad, j’ai donné en fief au tabernacle de Gabreʾēl, de ʿĀdwā’ 51 l. 11–13 (ed.), 61 l. 23–24 (tr.); ወኆልቈ፡ አልባስኒ፡ መንጦላዕት፡ ዘግምዛ፡ ፪ ወዘዶቲ፡ ፪ ወዘሥዕል፡ ፩፡ አልባሰ፡ ታቦት፡ ፫ ‘Ed anche il numero dei tessuti, 2 tende di stoffa colorata, 2 di doti, 1 dipinta, 3 paramenti per il tābot,’ 43 VI 19–20 (ed.), 36 l. 15–17 (tr.); ወሥዕል፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ፯፡ ወሥዕለ፡ ስቅለት፡ ፩[፡] ወታቦታት፡ ፲ወ፩፡ ‘7 immagini di nostra Signora Maria, 1 immagine della Crocefissione, 11 tābot,’ 64 l. 4–5 (ed.), 53 l. 9–10 (tr.) ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ tābota ḥegg ark of the Covenant በከመ፡ መርሐቶሙ፡ ለእስራኤል፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕጉ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር። በከመ፡ ይቤ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ወትቀድም፡ ምሕዋረ፡ ሠሉስ፡ ወታኀሥሥ፡ ሎሙ፡ ምዕራፈ፡ ‘come l’arca della legge del Signore guidò Israele, come ha detto la scrittura: ‘[l’arca dell’alleanza] precedeva durante le tre giornate di cammino e cercava per essi il luogo di sosta’’ 39 l. 43–45 (ed.), 36 l. 33–36 (tr.); ወጽዩንሂ፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ ተሰደት፡ በውእቱ፡ አዝማን፡ በዘመነ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ወጥንትዮን፡ በ፪፻፡ ፸ወ፩፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት። ‘Ṣyon, le tabernacle de la loi, fut expulsé, dans cette occasion, temps de l’évangéliste … nombre d’or … l’an 271 de la miséricorde. ’ 77 l. 7–9 (ed.), 93 l. 12–14 (tr.); ወእንዝ፡ ትሰደድ፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ ሶበ፡ አርትዑ፡ ፍኖተ፡ ሰብአ፡ ዚአሃ፡ መንገለ፡ ሰራዌ፡ ‘Lorsque l’arche de la Loi s’enfuit, ses gens prirent la direction du Sarāwē;’ 77 l. 14–15 (ed.), 93 l. 19–20 (tr.); ጽዮንሂ፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕግ፡ ተሰደት፡ በውእቱ፡ መዋዕል፡ ወበጽሐት፡ ውስተ፡ አሐቲ፡ ሀገር፡ እንተ፡ መንገለ፡ ቡር፡ ዘትሰመይ፡ ድግሳ። ‘Même Ṣyon, l’arche de la Loi, fut chassée, pendant ces temps; elle arriva dans une ville dans le Bur, qui s’appelle Degsā.’ 78 l. 8–9 (ed.), 94 l. 11–13 (tr.), vid. ሕግ፡ vid. also
ታቦት፡ tābot ark of Noah, ark of the Covenant, altar (by extension), case, coffer, slab on which the Ten Commandments are inscribed. It is a coffer of gold and gems preserved in the cathedral of Aksum, containing a slab on which are inscribed the Ten Commandments, supposed to be the Ark of Covenant carried from Jerusalem to Ethiopia by Menelik. In any other church it is a small oblong consecrated board of wood placed upon the slab of the altar (see 570, 589; 160–162, plates 100–103; 215–217; 39ff) 570a
ታቦት፡ ዘመርጡር tābot zamarṭur ark of the testimony, vid. መርጡር 361b
